body: Your art looks almost  exactly like eichiro Oda senpai art, where the hell are you now?

Hey I'm just discovering you for the first time and I had to create an account just so i could give props, seriously all your work is almost an exact replica of the art style used by the original manga author, plus I like how you start off with real scenes from the mangas and then develop it into hentai, good shit bruh
I knew, this is a reupload.
